Class Donut

java.lang.Object
com.group19.coffeeShop.MenuItem
com.group19.coffeeShop.Donut
Direct Known Subclasses:
CakeDonut, HoleDonut, YeastDonut
public abstract class Donut
extends MenuItem
Donut superclass for three types of Donuts.
